name: Feature Development Guide Template
markdown_template:
# Feature Development Guide

## How to Add New Features

When implementing new features for this {{.ProjectType}} application, follow these guidelines:

### 1. User Story Template
Use this template for new features:
- **As a** [role]
- **I want** [goal]
- **So that** [reason]
- **Acceptance Criteria**: [specific criteria]

### 2. Implementation Checklist
- [ ] Create/update database migrations
- [ ] Implement business logic in appropriate layer
- [ ] Add API endpoints (if applicable)
- [ ] Create/update views and templates
- [ ] Add comprehensive tests
- [ ] Update documentation
- [ ] Consider security implications
- [ ] Add error handling and validation

### 3. Framework-Specific Patterns
{{.FrameworkPatterns}}

### 4. Example User Stories
{{range .UserStories}}
**{{.Role}} Story:**
- As a {{.Role}}
- I want to {{.Goal}}
- So that {{.Reason}}
- Acceptance: {{.Acceptance}}
- Priority: {{.Priority}} | Complexity: {{.Complexity}}
{{end}}
